_sText:
Most likely you've played on a jail map, ie. ba_jail, where there are no lighting effects, and the textures don't match up. This is my own version of how a small privately run asylum would be set out.

note: exploding vent cover and car bomb included!!! 

Readme:

Extract this pack to steamapps/*yourname*/counter-strike source/cstrike




Credits : 

All mapping and design by Avenger093, inspired by tutorials found on YouTube.
Advice and help from Voltic Rage and PostFatal
